verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> sang <S%H7891><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and spoke, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I will sing <S%H7891><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for he has triumphed <S%H1342><s%> gloriously: the horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> has he thrown <S%H7411><s%> into the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song, <S%H2176><s%> and he is become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation: <S%H3444><s%> he is my God, <S%H410><s%> and I will prepare <S%H4633><s%> him an habitation; <S%H5115><s%> my father's <S%H1><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> him.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is a man <S%H376><s%> of war: <S%H4421><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is his name. <S%H8034><s%>

Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> chariots <S%H4818><s%> and his host <S%H2428><s%> has he cast <S%H3384><s%> into the sea: <S%H3220><s%> his chosen <S%H4005><s%> captains <S%H7991><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> are drowned <S%H2883><s%> in the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>
The depths <S%H8415><s%> have covered <S%H3680><s%> them: they sank <S%H3381><s%> into the bottom <S%H4688><s%> as a stone. <S%H68><s%>

Your right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> is become <S%H142><s%> glorious <S%H142><s%> in power: <S%H3581><s%> your right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> has dashed <S%H7492><s%> in pieces the enemy. <S%H341><s%>

And in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of your excellency <S%H1347><s%> you have overthrown <S%H2040><s%> them that rose <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H6965><s%> you: you sent <S%H7971><s%> forth your wrath, <S%H2740><s%> which <S%H834><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> them as stubble. <S%H7179><s%>

And with the blast <S%H7307><s%> of your nostrils <S%H639><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were gathered <S%H6192><s%> together, the floods <S%H5140><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> upright as an heap, <S%H5067><s%> and the depths <S%H8415><s%> were congealed <S%H7087><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

The enemy <S%H341><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will pursue, <S%H7291><s%> I will overtake, <S%H5381><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil; <S%H7998><s%> my lust <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H4390><s%> on them; I will draw <S%H7324><s%> my sword, <S%H2719><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall destroy <S%H3423><s%> them.

You did blow <S%H5398><s%> with your wind, <S%H7307><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> them: they sank <S%H6749><s%> as lead <S%H5777><s%> in the mighty <S%H117><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> to you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> among the gods? <S%H410><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> you, glorious <S%H142><s%> in holiness, <S%H6944><s%> fearful <S%H3372><s%> in praises, <S%H8416><s%> doing <S%H6213><s%> wonders? <S%H6382><s%>
You stretched <S%H5186><s%> out your right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> them.

You in your mercy <S%H2617><s%> have led <S%H5148><s%> forth the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> you have redeemed: <S%H1350><s%> you have guided <S%H5095><s%> them in your strength <S%H5797><s%> to your holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation. <S%H5116><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and be afraid: <S%H7264><s%> sorrow <S%H2427><s%> shall take <S%H270><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> on the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Palestina. <S%H6429><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> the dukes <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> shall be amazed; <S%H926><s%> the mighty <S%H352><s%> men of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> trembling <S%H7460><s%> shall take <S%H270><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> on them; all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> shall melt <S%H4127><s%> away.

Fear <S%H367><s%> and dread <S%H6343><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> on them; by the greatness <S%H1419><s%> of your arm <S%H2220><s%> they shall be as still <S%H1826><s%> as a stone; <S%H68><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> you have purchased. <S%H7069><s%>

You shall bring <S%H935><s%> them in, and plant <S%H5193><s%> them in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> in the place, <S%H4349><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which you have made <S%H6466><s%> for you to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in, in the Sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which your hands <S%H3027><s%> have established. <S%H3559><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>

For the horse <S%H5483><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and with his horsemen <S%H6571><s%> into the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on them; but the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> the prophetess, <S%H5031><s%> the sister <S%H269><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a tambourine <S%H8596><s%> in her hand; <S%H3027><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out after <S%H310><s%> her with tambourines <S%H8596><s%> and with dances. <S%H4246><s%>

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> them, Sing <S%H7891><s%> you to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for he has triumphed <S%H1342><s%> gloriously; the horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> has he thrown <S%H7411><s%> into the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H5265><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> and they went <S%H3318><s%> out into <S%H413><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Shur; <S%H7793><s%> and they went <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

And when they came <S%H935><s%> to Marah, <S%H4785><s%> they could <S%H3201><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Marah, <S%H4785><s%> for they were bitter: <S%H4751><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it was called <S%H7121><s%> Marah. <S%H4785><s%>
And the people <S%H5971><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall we drink? <S%H8354><s%>

And he cried <S%H6817><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H3384><s%> him a tree, <S%H6086><s%> which when he had cast <S%H7993><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were made sweet: <S%H4985><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> he made <S%H7760><s%> for them a statute <S%H2706><s%> and an ordinance, <S%H4941><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> he proved <S%H5254><s%> them,

And said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you will diligently listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and will do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in his sight, <S%H5869><s%> and will give ear <S%H238><s%> to his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> I will put <S%H7760><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of these diseases <S%H4245><s%> on you, which <S%H834><s%> I have brought <S%H7760><s%> on the Egyptians: <S%H4714><s%> for I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that heals <S%H7495><s%> you.

And they came <S%H935><s%> to Elim, <S%H362><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> wells <S%H5869><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> and three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten palm <S%H8558><s%> trees: and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> by the waters. <S%H4325><s%>
